notes: Eden has ASLR - addresses change every launch
Use FUNC_SIGNATURES to find functions by byte pattern each session
changeState bytes: f657bda9 f44f01a9 fd7b02a9 fd830091 080840b9 f303012a
Must use persistent tmux GDB session (eden-gdb) - batch connections crash Eden
Connect AFTER game loads, set breakpoints AFTER gameplay starts
Use handle SIGTRAP nostop noprint pass to avoid spurious stops
